skills.title: Front-End
skills.description:
Using the knowledge of HTML and CSS learned at school, 
I developed a variety of websites, ranging from simple web pages to a personal portfolio. 
Through this, I built a solid foundation in web structure and styling. Later, I utilized React to develop a Tech Website and personal portfolio projects, gaining experience in applying component-based architecture and state management. 

I focused on creating user-friendly UI and implementing responsive designs, which significantly enhanced my practical web development skills.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description:
Building on my academic foundation and practical experience, I have developed proficiency in back-end technologies. During my time as a Robotics Developer, I worked on integrating robotic systems with in-house software using C#. 

I handled data communication between robots and our system and used Redis to store and retrieve robot data, improving system performance through caching. 

In my academic projects, I worked with Java, MySQL, and OracleDB, which helped me understand database design, SQL queries, and backend logic. Recently, I expanded my skills by learning Node.js and exploring MongoDB to build RESTful APIs and lightweight back-end services. By combining these technologies, I have a strong grasp of developing scalable and maintainable server-side systems, with an emphasis on efficient data management and integration with front-end applications.

skills.title: Hardware
skills.description:
I have hands-on experience with AGV (Automated Guided Vehicles), AMR (Autonomous Mobile Robots), and Aircraft systems. My work involved integrating and troubleshooting power supply systems, handling electrical components, and performing sensor installations and soldering.

 I am familiar with using tools like multimeters for diagnostics, and I have experience with MQTT protocol for real-time data communication between devices, ensuring efficient and reliable system performance.

portfolio.title: Tech Website Project
portfolio.description: Rebuilt a Tech Website using React, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, with a focus on responsive design and improved user experience.
modalDescription:
This project involved rebuilding a Tech Website with a focus on responsive design and an enhanced user experience. 

I utilized React for component-based architecture, Tailwind CSS for modern styling, and JavaScript to implement dynamic features. The project aimed to improve navigation and optimize the website for both desktop and mobile users.
I utilized React for component-based architecture, Tailwind CSS for modern styling, and JavaScript to implement dynamic features.
The project aimed to improve navigation and optimize the website for both desktop and mobile users.

portfolio.title: Warehouse Automation Project
portfolio.description: Worked on a warehouse automation project optimizing logistics with autonomous forklifts and picking robots.
modalDescription: â™¦ Sensor inspection and safety validation
â™¦ C# development for real-time communication
â™¦ Redis for data caching and performance optimization

During the Warehouse Automation Project, I worked on integrating Multiway's AGV (Automated Guided Vehicle) Forklift and AMR (Autonomous Mobile Robot) Picking Robot to operate seamlessly within the same warehouse environment.
The project aimed to optimize warehouse logistics by automating material handling and item picking tasks.

Initially, I conducted comprehensive sensor inspections and safety tests on the AGV Forklift to ensure the robot could navigate safely and efficiently in a shared space. These tests included validating obstacle detection, route mapping, and emergency stop mechanisms to meet the required safety standards.
Following the initial testing phase, I focused on developing and implementing C# code to facilitate real-time communication between the robotic hardware and the warehouse management system.

Specifically, I worked on retrieving and processing status information from the AGV, such as its position, battery level, and operational state. By utilizing Redis for data storage and caching, I was able to optimize system performance, ensuring faster and more reliable data access during robot operations.

This project provided hands-on experience in robotic system integration, safety validation, and real-time data processing, contributing to the development of a more efficient and automated warehouse environment.

portfolio.title: Portfolio (Korean Ver)
portfolio.description: Built my first portfolio website in Korean using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project focused on creating a clean, responsive design with a user-friendly layout to showcase my skills and projects.

portfolio.title: POS System
portfolio.description: Project to improve POS System for a Thai Restaurant. Aimed to enhance the limited functionality of the existing system by providing a user-friendly interface

portfolio.title: Home Inventory System
portfolio.description: This project is a home inventory management web application developed using Java and MySQL. The goal is to help users organize and track their household items more efficiently. The application was built in NetBeans 8.2, with MySQL 8.0 as the database.

portfolio.title: Flight Reservation System
portfolio.description: Developed a flight reservation management system for the 'Traveless' travel agency as a personal project. Built the back-end using C# in Visual Studio to enable users to search flights, register travelers, and make reservations based on their travel details.

portfolio.title: Appliance Data Management System
portfolio.description: Created a data management system for Modern Appliances using C#. The system organizes and tracks appliances like refrigerators, vacuum cleaners, and microwaves, each with a unique item number.
